content: I actually left some space on my shelf for decorative items. I recently purchased a new area rug for my living room, and it really ties the whole room together. I was inspired by a design I saw on Pinterest, and I'm so happy with how it turned out. The rug has a subtle pattern and a soft, plush texture that's perfect for lounging around. I think I might add some decorative items, like vases or sculptures, to the shelf to complement the rug's design.
